name: IsraelClouds
0:
”Alexa, open IsraelClouds”
”Alexa, launch israel clouds”
”Alexa, start israel clouds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: israel clouds
des:
The IsraelClouds Alexa skill aims to bring on the latest cloud-related news in Israel and in the world.

The weekly podcast will keep you up-to-date on the latest trends in cloud computing technology with hand-picked curated news sourced from our cloud computing experts.

In our podcast, we will cover AWS, Azure, GCP and other interesting cloud platforms.
In addition, we will update about conventions, meetups, interesting articles and jobs, all related to cloud computing.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
